{{Han compound|囗|子|ls=i|t2=son}}. Compare {{zh-l|*囡}}.

===Etymology 1===
Min dialectal word for "son; child". Substrate borrowing, cognate with {{der|zh|mkh-pro|*kuun||child, son}} ({{cog|vi|con}}, {{cog|km|កូន}}).
